item.title: Starter kit help
item.dc:creator: @pregg pregg
item.description:
@pregg wrote:

you need to make it add a name to a list of people who have used it. Then make the command say that if the players name is on the list, then send a messege saying you’ve already used your starter. im not going to give a code for it, but keep the list in the data folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Starter kit help
item.dc:creator: @sp3c sp3c
item.description:
@sp3c wrote:

Ok here’s my code for starter kit:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)&& playerRights >= 0){
addItem(995,300000000);
sendMessage(“Good luck with da money!”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+“has just gotten their starter kit by typing ::starter!!!”;

Ok this works, but the prob is u can use it more than once (which is bad).
How can I make it only be used once by each player?

Read full topic
